sentences.en: a babe in arms.
sentences.cn: 还抱在怀里的小孩。

sentences.en: a cruise that cost an arm and a leg.
sentences.cn: 要花去好多钱的航行

sentences.en: A roll of fat jiggled on the underside of her arm.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊下侧有一层肥肉一颤一颤的。

sentences.en: Amy lifted her arm to wave. "Goodbye," she called.
sentences.cn: 埃米举起胳膊挥挥手。“再见，”她喊道。

sentences.en: Dave has a broken arm .
sentences.cn: 戴夫手臂断了。

sentences.en: He had a pile of books in his arms .
sentences.cn: 他抱着一摞书。

sentences.en: He had a pile of books in his arms.
sentences.cn: 他抱着一摞书。

sentences.en: He put his arm around Caroline'sshoulders and drew her close to him.
sentences.cn: 他一只手臂搂住卡罗琳的肩膀，将她拉近自己。

sentences.en: He struck a match, and held it at arm's length.
sentences.cn: 他划亮一根火柴，伸长胳膊举着。

sentences.en: He took the bewildered Elliott by the arm and guided him out.
sentences.cn: 他抓着不知所措的埃利奥特的胳膊，把他带了出来。

sentences.en: His collar bone only hurt when he lifted his arm.
sentences.cn: 他的锁骨只有在抬臂时才感觉到痛。

sentences.en: I could see big circles of dampness under each arm.
sentences.cn: 我能看到每只胳膊下都湿了一大圈。

sentences.en: I have a list of vices as long as your arm.
sentences.cn: 我的恶习一大堆。

sentences.en: I have a list of vices as long as your arm.
sentences.cn: 我的恶习一大堆。

sentences.en: I'd give my right arm to go with them.
sentences.cn: 为了和他们一起去，我愿付出极大代价。

sentences.en: kept the newcomer at arm's length at first.
sentences.cn: 一开始对新来的人保持一定距离

sentences.en: Meryl tucked the papers under her arm.
sentences.cn: 梅里尔把文件夹在腋下。

sentences.en: Michael held on to her arm, losing himself in the music.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔抓着她的手臂，沉醉于音乐中。

sentences.en: My left arm is badly bruised and I was slightly concussed.
sentences.cn: 我左臂严重擦伤，并有轻微脑震荡。

sentences.en: Pat was carrying a box under his arm .
sentences.cn: 帕特腋下挟着一个盒子。

sentences.en: Pat was carrying a box under his arm.
sentences.cn: 帕特腋下挟着一个盒子。

sentences.en: Sales of arms to the Middle East have dramatically increased.
sentences.cn: 销往中东的军火数量激增。

sentences.en: She had always kept his family at arm's length.
sentences.cn: 她一直与他的家人保持一定距离。

sentences.en: She hesitated, then put her hand on Grace's arm.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫了一下，然后把手放到格雷斯的胳膊上。

sentences.en: She slipped her arm under his and gave him a nudge.
sentences.cn: 她挽住他的胳膊，轻轻推了他一下。

sentences.en: She smiled her thanks and arranged the guitar under her arm.
sentences.cn: 她微笑着致了谢，把胳膊下面的吉他调整了一下。

sentences.en: she started putting the arm on them for donations.
sentences.cn: 她开始强迫他们捐钱。

sentences.en: The local farmers have armed themselves with rifles and pistols.
sentences.cn: 当地的农场主用步枪和手枪武装自己。

sentences.en: the long arm of the law caught up with him.
sentences.cn: 他终于难逃法网。

sentences.en: The old lady rushed to greet him, arms outstretched .
sentences.cn: 老太太张开双臂，快步上前迎接他。

sentences.en: the violin passed into the arms of a wealthy dilettante.
sentences.cn: 那把小提琴落到了一个对音乐一知半解的有钱人手里。

sentences.en: They walked along the beach arm in arm (=  with their arms bent around each other’s  ) .
sentences.cn: 他们臂挽臂走在沙滩上。

sentences.en: Tim’s mother put her arms around him.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆的母亲伸出双臂搂着他。

sentences.en: We went skipping down the street arm in arm.
sentences.cn: 我们挽着胳膊，蹦蹦跳跳地走在大街上。

sentences.en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
sentences.cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

words.tran_cn: 武装的；有扶手的；有防卫器官的（指动物）
无扶手的；无臂的；无武器的

phrases.phrase: an arm and a leg&I{【俚语】}

phrases.tran_cn: [讽刺语]执法人(如警察、法官、律师等)

phrases.phrase: as long as one’s (或 someone's) arm

phrases.tran_cn: 保持距离：以这样一个距离不鼓励身体的或社交的接触

phrases.phrase: cost an arm and a leg

phrases.tran_cn: （婴儿）只能抱在怀里，太小不会走路
避免与（人，物）亲近（或接近）
(北美， 非正式)强迫，迫使，胁迫
吊臂；弹簧吊架；悬挂臂，悬架臂
深远的威力（权力或影响）
竭力反对；进行武装斗争
张开双臂；热情地；亲切地

trans.tran_cn: 臂，手臂，袖子，扶手，狭长地带，分支机构
trans.tran_en: one of the two long parts of your body between your shoulders and your hands
if a man has a woman on his arm, she is walking beside him holding his arm
to provide weapons for yourself, an army, a country etc in order to prepare for a fight or a war
to provide weapons for yourself, an army, a country etc in order to prepare for a fight or a war
